
{{Client event}}
This event is triggered when a '''remote''' player quits the game or leaves the server. It '''will not''' get triggered on the source player's client. (Use [[/onClientResourceStop.md|onClientResourceStop]] to save client side data when the local player quits.)

==Parameters==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
string reason
</syntaxhighlight> 

*'''reason''': A string representing the reason why the player quit.
** "Unknown"
** "Quit"
** "Kicked"
** "Banned"
** "Bad Connection"
** "Timed out"

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the [[/player.md|player]] that quit the game.

==Example== 
This example prints a message in the chatbox when a remote player leaves the server.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function onQuitGame( reason )
    outputChatBox ( getPlayerName( source ).." has left the server ("..reason..")" )
end
addEventHandler( "onClientPlayerQuit", getRootElement(), onQuitGame )
</syntaxhighlight>
